summary: Implements a deprecated Stable Diffusion inpainting pipeline that preprocesses an input image and mask, encodes the text prompt, runs latent denoising with a conditional UNet and scheduler, decodes the final latents to an image, optionally applies a safety checker, and supports loading custom LoRA or textual‑inversion weights.
business_intent: Enable developers to add AI‑powered, text‑guided image editing where specific regions of a picture can be filled or altered according to a description, while providing safety filtering and extensibility through custom model adapters.
